response.overview: Brothers Daniel and Joel Trzcinski are Bliss Nova, a two-piece band living on opposite sides of Ohio. Hoping to find fresh creative direction, they meet to record an album at Dream Louder Studio in Toledo.
response.tagline: Brothers Daniel and Joel Trzcinski are Bliss Nova, a two-piece band living on opposite sides of Ohio. Hoping to find fresh creative direction, they meet to record an album at Dream Louder Studio in Toledo.
response.title: Echoes, Dust, & Rust
